DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "ON MARCH 3, 2011 PARTICIPANTS IN THE BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN FOR WHICH T. ROWE PRICE RETIREMENT PLAN SERVICES, INC. (\"RPS\"), A REGISTERED TRANSFER AGENT AND AN AFFILIATE OF TRPIS, SERVES AS RECORDKEEPER, WERE NOTIFIED OF A TENDER OFFER FOR SHARES OF BECKMAN COULTER, INC.  IN THIS NOTIFICATION, PARTICIPANTS IN THE PLAN WERE NOTIFIED THAT AS PART OF THE TENDER OFFER DECISION, BECKMAN COULTER DETERMINED THAT ALL TENDER OFFER CASH PROCEEDS RECEIVED BY THE BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN WOULD BE ALLOCATED TO THE PARTICIPANT'S ACCOUNT IN THE PLAN AND INVESTED IN THE PLAN'S DEFAULT INVESTMENT. THE BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN DEFAULT INVESTMENT IS THE AGE-APPROPRIATE T. ROWE PRICE RETIREMENT FUND FOR THE PLAN PARTICIPANT.  ON AUGUST 15, 2011, ANTONIO ALTOBELLI, A GROUP MANAGER OF THE T. ROWE PRICE PARTICIPANT SERVICE CENTER, RECEIVED A COPY OF A LETTER FROM [CUSTOMER], A PARTICIPANT IN BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN, DATED AUGUST 9, 2011 AND ADDRESSED TO [THIRD PARTY], VICE PRESIDENT OF HUMAN RESOURCES, BECKMAN COULTER.    IN HIS LETTER, [CUSTOMER] EXPRESSED DISPLEASURE ON HOW THE PROCEEDS FROM THE TENDER OFFER WERE INVESTED IN HIS BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN ACCOUNT.  IN THE LETTER, [CUSTOMER] STATES THAT \"HE LEARNED THAT A DECISION\" TO INVEST THE PROCEEDS IN THIS RETIREMENT DATE FUND WAS MADE BY ANTONIO ALTOBELLI OF T. ROWE PRICE AND [THIRD PARTY].  [CUSTOMER] STATED THIS INVESTMENT WAS \"VERSUS MY DIRECTION ON FILE,\" AN APPARENT REFERENCE TO HIS CURRENT INVESTMENT MIX ALLOCATION ON FILE WITH RPS.  RPS RESPONDED TO [CUSTOMER'S] LETTER ON AUGUST 26, 2011.  THE LETTER STATED THAT RPS CONTINUES TO HAVE [CUSTOMER'S] INVESTMENT MIX ALLOCATION ON FILE. HOWEVER, HE WAS INFORMED THAT THIS ELECTION PERTAINED ONLY TO HIS SALARY DEFERRAL CONTRIBUTIONS. AS THE TENDER OFFER PROCEEDS WERE NOT CONSIDERED A CONTRIBUTION, THE PROCEEDS WERE NOT INVESTED ACCORDING HIS INVESTMENT MIX ALLOCATION.",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$6,019.65",

  "Broker Comment" : "I AM GROUP MANAGER IN THE T. ROWE PRICE PARTICIPANT SERVICE CENTER.  IN THIS ROLE, I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR MANAGING A TEAM OF CALL CENTER REPRESENTATIVES.  THESE REPRESENTATIVES ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR HANDLING INBOUND CALLS FROM RETIREMENT PLAN PARTICIPANTS WHOSE PLANS ARE RECORD KEPT AT T. ROWE PRICE RETIREMENT PLAN SERVICES, INC.  IN THIS ROLE, I DO NOT EXERCISE ANY DECISION MAKING AUTHORITY OVER THE BECKMAN COULTER SAVINGS PLAN AND DID NOT MAKE ANY DECISION IN REGARD TO HOW THE TENDER OFFER PROCEEDS SHOULD BE INVESTED IN THE PLAN."
